data.title: What to Watch on Hulu: New August 2024
data.meta_description: From 'Only Murders’ S4 to ‘Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes’ — here’s what to watch on Hulu in August.
data.meta_site_name: What to Stream on Hulu | Guides
data.text:
Summer may be winding down, but the new shows, movies, and live specials coming to Hulu are just starting to heat up.

Don’t miss the streaming debut of Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes (2024) and new episodes of Only Murders in the Building and Solar Opposites. Also, catch exciting live events like the PGA TOUR and Lollapalooza live streams.

Wondering what to watch on Hulu in August? Here’s everything you’ll want to stream this month.

Get Started With Hulu

New Movies on Hulu

Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes (2024)

The popular Planet of the Apes franchise lives on with the newest installment, Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes, coming to Hulu on Friday, August 2.

In an era long after Caesar’s rule, apes thrive while humans are exiled to exist in the shadows. When a new, oppressive ape leader rises to power and expands his empire, a young ape embarks on a perilous journey, where he will shape the destiny of both apes and humans alike.

Have the ultimate Planet of the Apes marathon — stream the entire franchise (all 10 movies) now on Hulu, and check out our insider’s guide to the Planet of the Apes for more.

Watch: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes

Punch-Drunk Love (2002)

Romance blends seamlessly with dark comedy in Punch-Drunk Love — one of Adam Sandler’s first dramatic and artistic roles that proved his complex emotional range as an actor. Stream this classic early-2000s film when it comes to Hulu’s streaming library on Thursday, August 1.

Watch: Punch Drunk Love

Discover more of the best Adam Sandler movies of all time streaming now on Hulu.

New Shows on Hulu

Only Murders in the Building (S4)

Are you ready for a new season of the hit Hulu Original series, Only Murders in the Building? Us, too! And if you’ll allow us to humblebrag — the show recently received 21 Primetime Emmy® nominations for 2024.

Get ready for a brand new and star-studded season, featuring the return of Meryl Streep and new appearances from Eugene Levy, Eva Longoria, Zach Galifianakis, Melissa McCarthy, Molly Shannon, and Kumail Nanjiani. Our favorite true-crime trio will leave New York City and head to Hollywood for the newest season, starting Tuesday, August 27.

Watch: Only Murders in the Building

Dance Moms: A New Era

New coach, new team, new era, and new drama. The reality phenomenon that was Dance Moms returns in a new Hulu Original series, featuring Gloria “Glo” Hampton and her prestigious studio, Studio Bleu, in Ashburn, Virginia.

This new era premieres exclusively on Hulu, starting Wednesday, August 7. Until then, you can rewatch all eight seasons of the OG Dance Moms series now on Hulu.

Watch: Dance Moms: A New Era

Check out our insider’s guide to Dance Moms for everything you need to know about the iconic series.

Solar Opposites (S5)

At the end of Season 4, our favorite suburban Shlorpian aliens finally experience life on Earth as humans — but it doesn’t take long for them to realize it’s not as marvelous as they dreamed it would be. Instead, their brief time as humanoids has ignited a new determination to finally complete the mission (but we’ve heard that before).

Find out what happens next when Solar Opposites returns for Season 5, starting Monday, August 12.

Watch: Solar Opposites

Hulu is your animation destination. See all the “Animayhem” for yourself with Hulu’s animation hub.

Lollapalooza Live Stream

Don’t have tickets to Chicago’s iconic Lollapalooza music festival? There’s no need to feel FOMO because we have front row seats saved just for you. Crank the A/C, and watch bands and artists like Chappell Roan, Hozier, Reneé Rapp, and The Killers perform their sets in real time from the comfort of your living room.

From Thursday, August 1, through Sunday, August 4, all Hulu subscribers can stream Lollapalooza live.

Watch: Lollapalooza Live on Hulu

Live TV Events Streaming August 2024

No cable? No problem. Get access to 90+ TV channels, Disney+, and ESPN+ with a Hulu + Live TV subscription,* starting at just $76.99 per month.*

Sign Up for Hulu + Live TV

*A Live TV plan is required to watch live content on Hulu. Regional restrictions, blackouts, and additional terms apply.

2024 Paris Olympics

The biggest Opening Ceremony in Olympic history is happening on Friday, July 26. For the first time ever, the Opening Ceremony will be held outside of a stadium — and instead, on the Seine River through Paris, with each national delegation parading on its own boat.

Wondering how to watch the 2024 Paris Olympics without cable? Check out Hulu’s Olympics guide for more streaming and schedule information.

Watch the Olympics*

*A Live TV plan is required to watch live content on Hulu. Regional restrictions, blackouts, and additional terms apply.

NCAA Football

Football is BACK! Catch the first college football game of the season on Saturday, August 24 as Florida State goes head-to-head with Georgia Tech live on ESPN.*

Watch College Football on Hulu*

*A Live TV plan is required to watch live content on Hulu. Regional restrictions, blackouts, and additional terms apply.

PGA

The 2024 PGA TOUR is in full swing. With a Hulu + Live TV subscription, you can stream pro golf tournaments live on ESPN+, CBS,* NBC,* ESPN,* and Golf Channel.*

Watch the PGA Tour Live*

*A Live TV plan is required to watch live content on Hulu. Regional restrictions, blackouts, and additional terms apply.

MLB

Enjoy the last few weeks of summer with live baseball games on Hulu. Check out the Hulu MLB guide for more on how to stream baseball this season with the MLB Network, ESPN+, and Hulu + Live TV.

Watch MLB Games Live*

*A Live TV plan is required to watch live content on Hulu. Regional restrictions, blackouts, and additional terms apply.

Coming Soon to Hulu (September 2024)

In Vogue: The 90s

Each episode of the upcoming six-part Hulu Original docuseries In Vogue: The 90s focuses on the key moments that defined the 90s through the lens of fashion. From grunge to the Met Gala, Vogue editors like Hamish Bowles, Anna Wintour, Edward Enninful, and Tonne Goodman recount their experience of the 90s — a decade of transformation and change.

The first three episodes of In Vogue: The 90s will premiere on Friday, September 13, with the remaining episodes dropping a week later on Friday, September 20.

The Golden Bachelorette

The Golden Bachelor’s Gerry Turner might not have gotten his happily ever after since splitting with wife Theresa Nist only months after the wedding. But Joan Vassos is here to prove that love is still golden.
